Ocimum basilicum.description: Ocimum basilicum is a culinary herb in the family Lamiaceae. It is commonly used in Italian, Thai, and Vietnamese cuisine.

Origanum vulgare.description: Origanum vulgare is a perennial herb in the mint family. It is commonly used in Mediterranean and Mexican cuisine.

Rosa red.description: Rosa is a genus of woody perennial flowering plants in the family Rosaceae. The red rose is a popular ornamental plant.

Lilium white.description: Lilium is a genus of herbaceous flowering plants in the family Liliaceae. The white lily is a popular ornamental plant.

Lilium.description: Red lilies prefer a cool and humid environment, with temperatures between 50-70F (10-21C) and humidity levels around 50-60%. They thrive in bright, indirect light.

Taraxacum officinale.description: Dandelions are hardy plants that can tolerate a wide range of conditions, but they prefer cool temperatures and plenty of moisture. They grow best in full sun to partial shade.

Leucanthemum vulgare.description: Oxeye daisies prefer cooler temperatures and moderate humidity levels. They grow best in full sun to partial shade.

Petroselinum crispum.description: Parsley prefers moderate temperatures and humidity levels. It grows best in full sun to partial shade.

Saintpaulia ionantha.description: African violets prefer warm and humid environments, with temperatures between 65-75F (18-24C) and humidity levels around 50-60%. They grow best in bright, indirect light.

Aloe vera.description: Aloe vera prefers warm and dry environments, with temperatures between 60-85F (15-29C) and low humidity levels. It grows best in bright, direct light.

Crassula Ovata.description: A succulent plant with small, round, fleshy leaves.

Monstera Deliciosa.description: A tropical vine with large, fenestrated leaves.

Phalaenopsis.description: An epiphytic orchid with showy, fragrant flowers.

Begonia.description: A flowering plant with showy, colorful blooms.

Calathea.description: A tropical plant with strikingly patterned leaves.

Dracaena marginata.description: A tall, slender plant with spiky leaves.

Hedera helix.description: A climbing vine with small, lobed leaves.

Sansevieria trifasciata.description: A hardy plant with tall, upright leaves that are often variegated with shades of green and yellow. It is known for its air-purifying abilities and ability to tolerate low light and neglect.

Epipremnum aureum.description: A trailing vine with heart-shaped leaves that can be green or variegated with shades of yellow or white. It is a popular indoor plant due to its ease of care and ability to tolerate low light and varying levels of humidity.

Zamioculcas zamiifolia.description: A tropical plant with glossy, dark green leaves that grow on long, upright stems. It is known for its tolerance of low light, drought, and neglect.

Chlorophytum comosum.description: A plant with long, slender leaves that grow in a rosette and often produce small plantlets on long, arching stems. It is known for its air-purifying abilities and ease of care.

Spathiphyllum wallisii.description: A tropical plant with glossy, dark green leaves and elegant white flowers that bloom throughout the year. It is known for its air-purifying abilities and ability to tolerate low light and neglect.

Philodendron.description: A large and diverse group of tropical plants with glossy, heart-shaped leaves that come in a variety of colors and patterns. They are known for their air-purifying abilities and ease of care.

Ficus elastica.description: A large, upright plant with glossy, leathery leaves that can be dark green or variegated with shades of pink, white, or yellow. It is known for its air-purifying abilities and ability to tolerate low to bright light.

Monstera deliciosa.description: A tropical plant with large, fenestrated leaves that grow on long, vining stems. It is known for its striking appearance and ability to tolerate low to medium light levels.

Aglaonema.description: A group of tropical plants with variegated leaves that come in shades of green, silver, or pink. They are known for their air-purifying abilities and ability to tolerate low light and varying levels of humidity.

Nephrolepis exaltata.description: A popular fern with delicate, feathery fronds that grow on long, arching stems. It is known for its air-purifying abilities and ability to tolerate low light and high humidity.

Mentha.description: A group of aromatic herbs with small, serrated leaves that come in a variety of flavors such as peppermint, spearmint, and chocolate mint. They are often grown indoors for culinary use and can also be used for medicinal purposes.

Thymus vulgaris.description: A fragrant herb with small, gray-green leaves that grow on woody stems. It is often used in cooking and has medicinal properties as well.

Rosmarinus officinalis.description: An aromatic herb with needle-like leaves that are often used in cooking. It is known for its pungent fragrance and flavor, as well as its ornamental value.

Salvia officinalis.description: A flavorful herb with soft, gray-green leaves that are often used in cooking. It has a pungent aroma and flavor and is known for its medicinal properties as well.

Allium schoenoprasum.description: A flavorful herb with long, slender leaves that have a mild onion flavor. They are often used as a garnish or in salads and soups.

Coriandrum sativum.description: A fragrant herb with delicate, lacy leaves that are often used in Latin and Asian cuisine. The seeds of the plant are known as coriander and are also used as a spice.

Anethum graveolens.description: An aromatic herb with feathery, green leaves that are often used in pickling and other culinary applications. It is also used for medicinal purposes.
